# DockAccessory.StateChange

**Structure**

An event that indicates a change in the state of a dock accessory.

## Declaration

```swift
struct StateChange
```

## Overview

DockKit generates this event when a device docks or undocks from the dock accessory, or when a person presses the tracking button. To iterate the stream of state changes, see [doc://com.apple.DockKit/documentation/DockKit/DockAccessoryManager/accessoryStateChanges].

## Getting properties

- **accessory**: The dock accessory that generated the event.
- **state**: The state of the dock accessory associated with the event.

## Instance Properties

- **trackingButtonEnabled**: The state of the tracking button on the dock accessory.

## Getting accessory information

- **firmwareVersion**: The firmware version of the dock accessory.
- **hardwareModel**: The model of the dock accessory.
- **identifier**: The name and unique identifer of the dock accessory.
- **DockAccessory.Identifier**: Information that uniquely identifies the dock accessory.
- **DockAccessory.Category**: Types of supported dock accesories.
- **DockAccessory.State**: The state of a dock accessory.
- **DockAccessory.StateChanges**: An asynchronous sequence of dock accessory state changes.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
